artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Iseya Kanekichi; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 三輪の山　いかに待みん　年ふとも　尋る人も　あらじと思へば {Miwa no yama / ika ni machi min / toshi fu tomo / tazuneru hito mo / araji to omoe ba} (How shall I wait / long enough to see him come / to Miwa Mountain? / I know well the yeras will pass / and there will be no visitor) [Translated by Edwin A. Craston]
markings: date seal: 子十 {ne jū} (Rat 10) | censor seals: 福 {Fuku} | 村松 {Muramatsu} | publisher's seal: {Isekane} | carver's seal: 彫竹 {hori Take}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Visual Parody of the Thirty-Six Selected Poets (Mitate sanjūrokkasen no uchi 見立三十六歌撰之内)
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
title: Poem by Ise: (Actor Onoe Baikō IV as) Kumagai's Wife Sagami
